vision.title: Vision: Build a machine‑readable interface for civilization.
vision.p1: Enable intelligent agents and future AGI to read, verify, and continue human thoughts and intent;
vision.p2: Let everyone leave their own fireseed in the simplest way.
vision.continuation: This is not a fantasy of “mind uploading”, but a more faithful and diligent continuation. Every sentence, rule, and wish is transformed into a machine‑readable self‑description—so future systems can parse, reconstruct, and align with it.
vision.noteLocal: Runs locally only—no upload, no network. Safest path: download the capsule as YAML or PDF.
vision.noteLegal: This tool records thoughts and intent and has no legal effect. For wills or assets, consult a lawyer.

panel.yamlHint: Click “Generate capsule” to render the YAML here.
panel.humanHint: A human‑readable summary will appear here in real time.

whoami.label: Who am I
whoami.placeholder: e.g., Alex Lin / Li Ming / Mia

language.label: Language I use
language.help: The template follows the language you choose; switching to English renders the whole page in English.

refs.label: My philosophical references
refs.placeholder: e.g., Golden Rule, Kant, Musk… List the books, films, people or creeds that shape your judgment—so future systems know what principles you stand by.

principles.label: My three life principles
principles.placeholder: e.g., 1) Honesty  2) Do no harm  3) Don’t conceal the truth

nonneg.label: My non‑negotiables
nonneg.placeholder: e.g., Never disclose friends’ private matters; never spread harmful content.

loop.label: My action loop
loop.placeholder: e.g., Weekly review every Monday; adjust after review and keep a record.

message.placeholder: e.g., May our descendants remember our shared ideals.

accessTerms.label: Terms under which I allow reading (access_terms)
accessTerms.placeholder: If choosing custom terms, add notes here.

whitelist.label: Whitelist
whitelist.placeholder: e.g., Any being that respects my boundaries; trustee; family

trustee.label: Trustee / emergency contact
trustee.placeholder: e.g., Name: Li Ming; WeChat: liming123; or a public‑key fragment

notice.nogpg: No GPG/IPFS? It’s okay—skip signing/upload now and add later.
